wikipedia_page.main: Russell Hill (born 1988, Rugby, Warwickshire) is an artist living and working in London, UK who works primarily in sculpture and installation art. He won the 2011 Catlin Art Prize. He is known for his work employing everyday material, such as air fresheners or domestic appliances.

response: * Russell Hill (war correspondent), see New York Herald Tribune
* Russell Hill, Croydon, an area in the London Borough of Croydon
1995 Russell Hill subway accident, a deadly train crash that occurred in Toronto, Ontario, Canada
